title: Project Hourglass
description: The Dark Seeds is a multi character driven series, set in our possible future, molded from the choices of today. The last glimmer of hope lies within a few extraordinary blood lines. Their courage is tested when they must fight for freedom theyâ€™ve never known. Will their sacrifice be enough to wake our sleeping world before the darkness consumes humanity forever? Picking up where the first book, Crows Hill left off, Project Hourglass promises to answer those aching questions while opening new doors for you to walk through.
author: L.M. Fields
